name: The Underground (PepperBoi)
description:
*THERES A CRASH AT AROUND 58 SECONDS*

Game made for the Godot Wild Jam #45 with the theme Underground. Dodge trains and fight enemies to try to get first on the leaderboard!

Join my discord: https://discord.gg/8tAvpcSz7x

 Controls (rebindable):
  • Move: Arrows
  • Attack: X
  • Dash: Z
Credit:
  • Programmer/Artist: Pepperboi
  • Programmer/Artist: rein
  • Composer/SFX: NoxInBox/Multitool Studio
